mapper.select: SELECT b_no, b_subject, m_nick, b_regdate, b_grade, b_hit, num FROM (SELECT b_no, b_subject, m_nick,b_regdate, b_grade, b_hit, rownum as num FROM (SELECT b.b_no, b.b_subject, m.m_nick, b.b_regdate, b.b_grade, b.b_hit FROM board b, member m where b_grade=#{grade} AND b.m_email=m.m_email ORDER BY b.b_no DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/10) FROM board WHERE b_grade=#{grade}
SELECT b_no, m.m_nick, b_subject, b_regdate, b_grade, b_hit, b_content FROM board b, member m WHERE b_grade=#{grade} AND b_no=#{b_no} AND b.m_email=m.m_email
